reviews.title: First Class
reviews.text: First Class Service from individuals that care.

reviews.title: Great local building society.
reviews.text: Very helpful, friendly and knowledgeable staff wether you call in person or phone.

reviews.title: Helpful and friendly
reviews.text: All staff are always helpful and friendly, providing excellent service, easily accessible and practical support.

reviews.title: Amazing service, amazing staff,
reviews.text: Long time banking with Cumberland, why go anywhere else, they have always been totally supportive, always there to answer questions and faultless, Dave Laverock Law

reviews.title: Business account for small business
reviews.text: We have held a business account with the Cumberland Building Society for over 8 years now. From the switch transfer of the account from our bank to date, the service has been fantastic. They are always there both at the local branch and head office/ customer service to help with any queries. The branch network is amazing and makes it so easy to access when you need a branch service. In the main we use the internet banking, always working, secure, easy to use facility. This links easily with our personal accounts which are also with the Cumberland. I would not consider any other provider for our business or personal banking. They are at the forefront of technology with an excellent customer service.

reviews.title: Excellent service
reviews.text: Always a pleasure with The Cumberland x Staff are so friendly and lovely

reviews.title: LONG LOST VALUES FOUND HERE
reviews.text: We have a commercial mortgage and a business account with the Cumberland and we are very, very pleased that this has been the case during this last awful year. Fortunately, we have not had to borrow or refinance to survive but our business manager contacted us early on to offer help and advice. They have been supportive and kind. It is a mystery to me why they were not permitted to administer the Bounce Back loans since they are, in my extensive experience, more efficient than any other bank I have dealt with. Excellent customer service all round.

reviews.title: Friendly, local, personal service
reviews.text: I used my local branch to set up a small business account. They couldn't have been more helpful and it's a joy to be able to talk to them face to face. The online banking is excellent. Highly Recommend

reviews.title: CUmberland
reviews.text: Customer services internet baking and phone apps are brilliant - the products themselves and the charges are not.

reviews.title: Very helpful and friendly
reviews.text: Local very helpful and friendly building society

reviews.title: Account
reviews.text: Great day to day account runs smoothly any problems there soon rectified by lovely friendly staff.

reviews.title: Very helpful very friendly very professional
reviews.text: I recently had my bank account hacked & the team at CBS responded immediately, replaced my funds & were very reassuring

reviews.title: Amazing Customer Service
reviews.text: Everytime I have a query or issue I just give customer service a quick ring, never on hold for more than 5 mins. And they always resolve my issue instantly.

reviews.title: Excellent customer service
reviews.text: I’ve always received excellent support from the Cumberland when I’ve needed it.

reviews.title: Reputation
reviews.text: The Cumberland has an extremely good reputation and it is 100% deserved :-)

reviews.title: Great, personal service
reviews.text: Really friendly local staff both in branches and in the call centre.

reviews.title: Always used Cumberland I wouldn't go anywhere else for banking and mortgage.
reviews.text: Staff are always knowledgeable and friendly. Get things done quickly. Mobile banking app is great and easy to use.

reviews.title: Brilliant building society
reviews.text: Very friendly customer service both in person and on the phone, always reassuring when dealing with problems. I have both a current account and savings and find them easy to access and use.

reviews.title: Always polite and helpful unlike a lot of banks.
reviews.text: Been with them 22yrs and wouldn't go anywhere else.

reviews.title: Fresh and modern feel
reviews.text: Love the App for all my accounts. Its so easy to use and transferring money and paying bills is a simple straightforward process

reviews.title: Personal service
reviews.text: Always greeted with a friendly smile in the branch. Great customer service.

reviews.title: Local Cumbrian Bank
reviews.text: The Cumberland is a key part of Cumbria and has always been the home bank of me and all my family. Simple and very helpful

reviews.title: Best ethical bank
reviews.text: Hi I would like to endorse the Cumberland as the best ethical financial provider. Their support for the community and their customers has been amazing. They support so many great organisations and do this in a way that provides sustainable support rather than just quick donations so it's great to see organisations like Susan's Farm get support over a number of years

reviews.title: Fantastic Customer Service
reviews.text: I’ve been with the Cumberland ever since I got my first debit account and the have been absolutely fantastic. The customer service team are very dedicated and quick to respond. They’ll get any query sorted. Highly recommended

reviews.title: Awful with hidden charges
reviews.text: Avoid like the plaque. Lots of hidden charges and terrible customer service due to their bullying nature towards their staff. They also sent me someone else's online banking details when I requested my online banking pin.

reviews.title: Excellent all round
reviews.text: Cumberland BS have been fantastic - every step of the way, no fuss, no problems.

reviews.title: A great building society
reviews.text: I have used them for years and always had great service. In fact it would seem that the other reviewer had a similar experience until they incurred a charge and then tried to blame the staff. Take responsibility yourself dear.

reviews.title: Disappointing considering my Grannie set up this account for me 20 years ago.
reviews.text: Appalling service, sneaky about when and where you'll be charged for unauthorised overdrafts. Rude staff cannot wait till I close my account.

reviews.title: Just awful
reviews.text: I very much regret taking a mortgage out with this building society. Worst lender I’ve encountered in over 30 years. Customer service is non existant. They want an insane amount of information when it comes to borrowing anything and then tell me that I can’t afford £5k extra on my mortgage even though my salary just increased by £14k. Won’t use the again.

reviews.title: Very poor
reviews.text: Awful application process. Staff were like robots. Very, very disappointed and won’t use again

reviews.title: Brilliant from start to finish
reviews.text: From the first call to moving in the Cumberland kept me informed about my application, best part was being able to speak to the same person for the whole time - Thank you

reviews.title: Good Customer Service
reviews.text: Always great customer service every time I call or pop into a branch. Staff are friendly and go the extra mile.

reviews.title: Genuine Friendly People!
reviews.text: We got our first Mortgage with The Cumberland and it was a very calm and friendly experience. Everything was explained thoroughly and help was always just a phone call away!

reviews.title: Mortgage and loans support
reviews.text: Always friendly polite and helpful

reviews.title: Locals
reviews.text: Great BS in the South West and northern England . Who look after there customers with that personal touch . Love that you can go on holiday with no charges on your debit card . Been a customer for 35 years and will not be moving

reviews.title: Not just a number
reviews.text: I lobe how personal this building society is. Ive used this bank for as long as I can remember as My Mum has too. They are reliable and always there to help with anything you need or want from a bank. I trust them and would never want to look elsewhere to look after my money. My little boy also has 2 savings accounts now and i hope he chooses the Cumberland when he grows up. Annie

reviews.title: Personal service, great products
reviews.text: The Cumberland has a range of specialist products all sold by knowledgeable and friendly staff. I can always pick up the phone and speak to someone who knows what they're talking about.

reviews.title: They saved our lives gave h us a mortgage
reviews.text: We were after a mortgage and we were in our late 60s they give us one I can not thank them enough the manager at the branch was a absolute star I thank her as well hope they win a brilliant company and wonderful staff

reviews.title: Great mortgage rates
reviews.text: So easy and straightforward to get a first time buyers mortgage with the Cumberland. Lovely staff!

reviews.title: Initial mortgage appointment
reviews.text: As a first time buyer I was a little unsure as to what to expect from my initial mortgage appointment. Lewis at the Cumberland was very knowledgeable and gave me all the tools I needed to feel more confident in making an offer on my first home.

reviews.title: Great service, great team
reviews.text: All the mortgages are really helpful and offer a friendly local service compared to other financial institutions

reviews.title: Moved house
reviews.text: Moved house and had been mortgage free for many years.Needed a little top up and had used Cumberland Building Society many years ago.Advisor was great with us

reviews.title: Good service and competitive rates
reviews.text: Mortgage advisor was supportive, attentive and helpful whilst helping us to find the best rate. Good service over the phone

reviews.title: Innovative and resposive
reviews.text: Cumberland Buiding Society provide outstanding service with friendly, helpful and knowledgable staff. Their new mortage into reitrement products are a godsend to us older clients who until now had no options for home ownership without getting a Lottery win and buying outright.

reviews.title: Real People serving Real People
reviews.text: They operate as a small family business but with the weight of a large bank. Love the personal approach - not a robot in sight

reviews.title: A green mortgage
reviews.text: I just saw you topped the Ethical Consumer rating for banks and lenders. I am surprised that green investing is still only an option. Thank you for leading the way. No-one should be investing in financing climate change.

reviews.title: So helpful and supportive
reviews.text: From start to finish, the experience was friendly, helpful and easy. Excellent customer service, accurate and efficient.

reviews.title: Renewing Mortgage
reviews.text: Incredible service from start to finish. I appreciated how all the staff were aware of my case so everytime I spoke to someone, I didn't have to keep repeating myself. Informative and very slick organisation

reviews.title: Retirement mortgage
reviews.text: We applied for a retirement mortgage to enable us to extend our current property. This was not an issue for the Cumberland Building Society and we were granted it without any problem despite our age.

reviews.title: Although we are retired the Cumberland made our mortgage possible so we could extend our home.
reviews.text: They went the extra mile to reassure us we could have a retirement mortgage to achieve our objective. Very helpful.

reviews.title: Ggf
reviews.text: Yyjjhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhgggggggggggggggg

reviews.title: Friendly local service and good online banking.
reviews.text: Friendly local service and good online banking. Thankfully The Cumberland Building Society is one of the very few banks left in town and soon will be the last. It is appreciated for its branch availability, friendly staff, good range of savng products and great customer service. It is the best bank I have ever dealt with.

reviews.title: Excellent Service
reviews.text: I have been with the Cumberland for the over 10 years and have always found them to be friendly and efficient.

reviews.title: Great customer service
reviews.text: Really helpful local bank. They go out of their way to sort any issues out for you with local service at the end of the phone or in brach. No international help centres located halfway across the world.

reviews.title: Customer Serrvice at its best
reviews.text: I've never once had an issue with the Cumberland since I opened my account 6 years ago. I will support my local Building Society for the foreseeable future

reviews.title: Good Old Fashioned Customer Service
reviews.text: People you can talk to, who have a direct line and are always willing to help. True relationship banking.

reviews.title: Great company
reviews.text: Always doing the right thing to help customers

reviews.title: Great personal service
reviews.text: The colleagues in the local branches and at the Call Centre are helpful and friendly and make a genuine effort to provide a personal service to customers.

reviews.title: Friendly, ethical banking
reviews.text: I have banked with the Cumberland for a few years now. I get straight through on the phone whenever I need to call and the staff are amazingly helpful. I even recently took a mortgage out with them too. I love that they are ethical with a personal service. Only slight downside is that electronic payments to other bank accounts do not appear immediately as with some other banks, but for me the ethical aspect is worth waiting those few hours for a transfer.

reviews.title: Ethical banking across Cumbria
reviews.text: Cumberland Building Society has the ethics I want, and the branches I need.

reviews.title: Ethical banking on your doorstep
reviews.text: I recently switched my banking to The Cumberland. I found them to be efficient and helpful. I wanted to change to more ethical, sustainable banking. The Cumberland more than fitted the bill - local banking services for local people, there's even a branch on the high street :-)

reviews.title: How banks should be
reviews.text: They are such an amazing place to bank. I feel like I can go to them with anything, and they are always happy to help. Whether visiting my local branch, or calling head office, they just make you feel like the most important customer.

reviews.title: Twenty five years of good service.
reviews.text: We have been with the Cumberland Building Society since we got married and wouldn’t go anywhere else, friendly and helpful people x

reviews.title: Always friendly and helpful
reviews.text: Very informative about best available products for the customer. Have been a customer for 30+years this speaks for itself.

reviews.title: Local, friendly, informed, accessible,
reviews.text: I've banked with the Cumberland for over 20 years and made use of a wide range of their products from mortgages and re-mortgages to Savings, current and children's savings accounts. They have lots of local branches making them very accessible to the community. As a result they are also a respected local employer. Their staff are always friendly and well informed and they offer a good range of competitive financial products.

reviews.title: Friendly and reliable
reviews.text: It is so good to be able to bank locally and staff always friendly.

reviews.title: Best for Cumbrians
reviews.text: Been with them over 25years and would not change to another provider. Local and understands the people

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.text: I switched to a Cumberland current account this year and have been very happy with the service received.

reviews.title: Great customer Service
reviews.text: Always there with a smiley face and a helpful attitude, the staff are great

reviews.title: Cumberland app
reviews.text: Had the app for years and been great, had a problem with the app for 2 or more weeks after popping in to the branch and the IT on it, phone calls a lady called Amy got it all sorted. She was brilliant and got it working. Thanks

reviews.title: Ethical local business
reviews.text: Really Easy to switch when I wanted to get my money out of one if the big banks to avoid investment in oild & gas. Good to know I'm now supporting local businesses, groups and residents who need loans and grants.

reviews.title: Simple and easy to understand the app.
reviews.text: I use this app on a daily basis to keep up to date with my spending. Very easy to understand.

reviews.title: Efficient and friendly service
reviews.text: The Cumberland provides us with free current account banking and linked savings. The website is easy to use and staff are very helpful with any non-standard transactions.

reviews.title: Outstanding customer service
reviews.text: Great range of current and savings accounts available. Internet and mobile banking easy to access and navigate, with useful, straightforward functionality. Staff are extremely helpful if you need to ring Customer Services, with limited waiting times. Highly recommend. What are you waiting for?

reviews.title: Friendly local branch teams
reviews.text: While most of the big banks have abandoned the market town of Cockermouth, The Cumberland Building Society has stayed open though economic downturn and Covid-19. We really appreciate the Cumberland's loyalty to the town and the friendly service from our local branch team., Thank you all.

reviews.title: Friendly service, easy to use app
reviews.text: Staff always friendly, easy straightforward banking. App is clear and easy to use, as is the website. If you ever need anything it’s easy to speak to a member of customer service

reviews.title: Anywhere, anytime
reviews.text: The flexibility of this, and other, Cumberland account suits my needs perfectly. Staff are both knowledgeable and helpful and the online interface is simple and flows seamlessly, allowing instant access anywhere at anytime.

reviews.title: Personal Service
reviews.text: Staff are always helpful and every trip is made personal. A local business I will always be happy to support

reviews.title: Great local service from a friendly team
reviews.text: I use the Plus current account for all my day to day banking needs and it suits my purposes entirely. The website is easy to use and when I have queries or concerns I can call the local team at Carlisle who are patient, very helpful and always friendly. I like that the branches still have counter service and I have found the quality of service overall better than previous high street banks I have used

reviews.title: Consistantly Good
reviews.text: Always there if they're needed. Always helpful. Always friendly.

reviews.title: amazing
reviews.text: Easy to use, low charges, ethical standpoint

reviews.title: Great service but needs work
reviews.text: They offer great option for current account personally and offer amazing customer service but i would like see bit more with the current account

reviews.title: Great people offering really fantastic service
reviews.text: Great people delivering brilliant service to local communities and customers

reviews.title: Still there for us!
reviews.text: The Cumberland continues to provide an open door to welcome customers with a smile despite Covid and the difficulties of lockdown in 2020 and 2021. Cockermouth, for instance, has lost four banks in the last few years (Halifax, HSBC, NatWest and Lloyds). They have loss out to our regional bank which is there for customers 6 days a week with long opening hours each day. All credit to our fantastic Cumberland Building Society!

reviews.title: A trustworthy current account
reviews.text: I love the Cumberland Building Society. They don’t always get it right but the way they have helped people during the Coronavirus epidemic is brilliant. They have waived overdraft interest completely. This is the true morals of a building society. Unlike Nationwide who are still charging 18.9%! Well done Cumberland in doing the right thing.

reviews.title: Great building society
reviews.text: Excellent current account with a fair overdraft rate compared to some of the banks and now the Nationwide Building Society, who are more like a bank!! You can use your debit card abroad with no charge which is a really fair approach.

reviews.title: A great Building Society
reviews.text: They offer a fair current account overdraft, as they should as a building society. Unlike Nationwide! They allow you to use your debit card worldwide with no fee. Their customer service is in the U.K. and straight through to someone. Their savings are a bit hit and miss though.

reviews.title: Free withdrawals abroad
reviews.text: Use your card when you travel for free is the best thing about this account. The staff are supurb.

reviews.title: Wonderful to have a friendly local bank that is stil...
reviews.text: Wonderful to have a friendly local bank that is still on the high street where I can pop in a get things done quickly. Good range of savings products at a fair interest rate.

reviews.title: Great service from real people
reviews.text: Great experience. Know what they're talking about and very helpful.

reviews.title: Friendly staff and local branches
reviews.text: Unlike the big banks that have largely abandoned customers, we are delighted to have a local bank that is open 6 days a week and where the staff seem happy to see you. Convenient current account and top ISA rate.

reviews.title: Great product, wonderful service
reviews.text: The savings account is easy to use and pays a great rate. The customer service is above and beyond and it's lovely to speak to people really easily.

reviews.title: Great rates
reviews.text: Easy to use the app online to manage transferring funds across accounts. Friendly customer service whenever I ring for help.

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.text: Great service delivered by great people

reviews.title: Savings
reviews.text: Great savings account but can access when needed

reviews.title: Friendly and professional
reviews.text: We have banker with the Cumberland for over 40 years & in that time they have never failed to provide superbly professional service to us

reviews.title: Great staff
reviews.text: So helpful about different accounts.the people in wigton branch on the counter are so informative you don’t need to have an appointment to get great advice

reviews.title: Staff
reviews.text: They set are consistently helpful and friendly and always have time to patiently listen to customers requests.

reviews.title: First Class Service
reviews.text: The staff in my local branch are very helpful and knowledgeable

reviews.title: Ethical and helpful
reviews.text: Knowledgeable friendly helpful staff in branch, and on the end of the phone. Ethical products from an ethically responsible business.

reviews.title: Favourite place to bank
reviews.text: Friendly and helpful staff. Always a pleasant experience visiting Cockermouth branch.

reviews.title: Helpful and friendly advice
reviews.text: Great service, helpful and friendly advice over the phone and in branch. A good range of account options for personal and business needs.

reviews.title: Banking with the Cumberland
reviews.text: I have been banking with the Cumberland Building Society in Dumfries some 30 years ago since it first opened there. .I have recently moved all my banking to them as I have always found the service first class.

reviews.title: Cumberland comes up trumps
reviews.text: Excellent and knowledgable staff, many branches available to help. Various accounts/savings available with competitive rates proud that they are my local building society
